subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Hill ’n’ Dale Farms said the multiple graded stakes-winning filly Indyanne was euthanized after breaking an ankle during a race last month. A statement from the farm said veterinarians determined it would have been inhumane to continue treatment.
snippet: Hill ’n’ Dale Farms said the multiple graded stakes-winning filly Indyanne was euthanized after breaking an ankle during a race last month. A statement from the farm said veterinarians determined it would have been inhumane to continue treatment.
